requirements.install: git clone https://github.com/ameenmaali/urldedupe.git --depth 1 && cd urldedupe && cmake CMakeLists.txt && make && mv urldedupe /usr/local/bin/ && cd .. && rm -rf urldedupe

command: cat filteredurls.txt | pvreplace -silent -payload ~/.garudrecon/wordlist/xss-small.txt -fuzzing-part param-value -fuzzing-type replace -fuzzing-mode single | unew -el -t -q xss_pvreplace.txt
